content: Set terminal title to indicate current work
Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Update FormatCorrection struct in engine.rs to add optional fields: supported_operations, mutation_paths, type_category
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating FormatCorrection struct
Remove test_component_format_with_spawn function from tier_execution.rs since it's no longer needed
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing test_component_format_with_spawn
Modify try_direct_discovery in tier_execution.rs to gather facts but NOT return corrections (always return None)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after modifying try_direct_discovery
Update process_discovery_response functions to extract and store facts instead of returning corrections
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating process_discovery_response
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues without using dead code markers or underscore prefixes
Create a context/data structure to pass discovered facts from Tier 2 to Tier 3
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating facts data structure
Enhance apply_transformer_based_discovery to accept optional discovered facts and create rich responses
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after enhancing apply_transformer_based_discovery
Update tier execution flow to pass facts from Tier 2 to Tier 3 and ensure Tier 3 always runs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating tier execution flow
Update FormatCorrection creation to include rich information when available from Tier 2 facts
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating FormatCorrection creation
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues without using dead code markers or underscore prefixes
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation plan was followed
When subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
